channel.title: php on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in php on Just a Memo

item.title: Php-fpm
item.description: Install /Upgrade php-fpm Config /etc/php/fpm-php7.2/fpm.d/www.conf filename: /etc/php/fpm-php7.2/fpm.d/www.conf listen = /run/php-fpm.socket listen.owner = nginx listen.group = nginx listen.mode = 0660 Adjust upload limited filename: /etc/php/fpm-php7.2/php.ini upload_tmp_dir = /tmp upload_max_filesize = 20M /etc/ngnix/nginx.conf filename: /etc/ngnix/nginx.conf client_max_body_size 20M; client_body_buffer_size 128k; Add php-fpm to default service # sudo /etc/init.d/php-fpm start # rc-update add php-fpm default Setup php-fpm in nginx 简单的只用一个nginx.co
